about_the_game:
They have taken over everything, it's up to you to LIBERATE the entire world!




* Find other Survivors and bring them with you.
* Build your base with a Workshop, Generator, Houses and plenty of Defenses and Traps!


* Split up into multiple teams and explore different areas, don't forget to bring enough ammo when you leave your base!
* Set up outposts to gather resources in far away lands and Transport them back to your base through Automated machines, ensure the Zombies don't destroy your logistics!


* Craft items, armor, weapons and lots of ammo, build Drones to help you Gather, Craft and Patrol


* Explore a large persistent open world, with no loading or mission instances, everything happens in the world.
* Turn-Based so you can take your time to think and come up with the perfect Strategy


* Ambush Zombies and take them all out without suffering casualties
* Be careful when exploring at night, and be even more careful so you don't attract a massive horde!

Start just with one Survivor and Liberate the entire World!

Add to your Wishlist now! 2025


And follow the Development on YouTube @CodeMonkeyUnity

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

name: Total World Liberation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years

short_description: Open World Survival Automation Crafting Building Turn-Based game, yup that's a huge mix of genres and it works!
